content.text: Nothing much, just got hired at Mcdonald's last week. How are you?

I'm good, I'm an environmental engineer. I love my job. It allows me to work from home and have the flexibility I need to take care of my health. I also love listening to the Beatles while I work on my dog's training.

That's great! I wish I had a job that I loved. I'm a wedding planner and my passion for helping couples create the perfect wedding day will not let me give up hope even in the most difficult of situations.
That's really interesting! I've never met a wedding planner before. How does that work?

It's actually pretty fun! I work with couples to plan their perfect wedding day. I help them find venues, vendors, and everything else they need. It's a lot of work but it's so rewarding to see the couples' faces on their wedding day.
That sounds like a lot of fun! I'm glad you love your job.
What do you like to do for fun?
I love deep sea diving! It's so peaceful and relaxing. I also love working with my hands and building things with my husband.
That's cool! I've never been deep sea diving before. I've always wanted to try it.
You should! It's a lot of fun.
I might just have to give it a try!
